summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley as platted in Block 1, Wild Rose Addition, being the alley between 8th Avenue West and 7th Avenue West, from West McGraw Street to West Wheeler Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 13921 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
